titleStmt.title: A modest vindication of the case of John Giffard gent· And an answer to the reply of the preservators of Deane Forest. With certain reasons why those iron works should not be demolished untill his stock be wrought out.
titleStmt.author: Giffard, John.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: staining with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Columbia University Library.
